name: WooCommerce TBC Credit Card Payment Gateway (Free)
author: Plug and Pay Ltd.

sections.description:
Accept Visa/Mastercard payments in your WooCommerce shop using TBC gateway.

Free

  • SMS transaction type allows you to capture funds instantly
  • Accepts GEL
  • Close business day
  • Autogenerated OK/FAIL urls
  • Detailed logs
  • 10 transactions per month

Premium

  • All features from the Free version
  • DMS transaction type allows you to block required amount first and capture funds later (within 30 days)
  • Refunds
  • Multiple TBC merchant accounts
  • Accepts GEL, USD, EUR
  • Unlimited transactions
  • Support (mail/phone)

Learn more about our premium plugin
sections.installation:
For help setting up and configuring this plugin please refer to our documentation

FAQ
Troubleshooting
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

  • chore: Remove screenshots from plugin repo
  • refactor: New plugin structure
  • feat: Product and Blog dashboard widgets
  • refactor: Log close business day
  • refactor: WordPress coding standard (WPCS)
  • refactor: Update log method to use levels
  • docs: Improve readme for clarity and consistency
  • chore: Add empty pot
  • feat: Gateway status report dashboard
  • feat: Gateway availability check
  • refactor: Remove Alcohol\ISO421 dependency
  • chore: Remove translation for logs
  • feat: Better language detection
  • fix: Blogname encoding problems with API

1.0.3

  • feat: Merchant host option (securepay, ecommerce)
  • refactor: Improve ok/fail inputs

1.0.2

  • Updated compser dependencies
  • Fixed typo get_total is a method

1.0.1

  • Fixed Woo 3.* compatibility issues

1.0.0

  • Initial release

upgrade_notice.2.0.0: Please Write down plugin setting (WooCommerce -> Settings -> Payments -> TBC Free) as they will be lost during upgrade. You will need to reinsert these settings later.
